'SILIENT HERO' Robertson points out the game changer

Football Andree · 28/08/2023 · Liverpool

﻿ Sharing on Premier League Productions, defender Andy Robertson gave his winged words to his colleague Joe Gomez.

Last night, Andy Robertson and his teammates spent 90 emotional minutes at St James' Park. They were leading early and even only played with 10 men after Virgil van Dijk's red card .

However, Liverpool  were not broken and had a classy comeback in the last minutes. 

After the game, Andy Robertson said that the appearance of Joe Gomez was a pretty important turning point. Robertson said: " I think Joey is absolutely brilliant. I think he came on, in a difficult moment, we were leading 1-0, we were 10 men, the crowd got up and It just seems like it's a one-way street."

"But Joey calmed us down, to be honest. He started to touch the ball. Started making passes.. I think he's amazing. I think he did. played brilliantly for 60-70 minutes, of course could be longer."

Thus, after the first three rounds, Liverpool still kept the unbeaten record, with 2 wins and 1 draw.
